theorem.name: mul_base_clause

text.english: Base clause of the definition of \(\texttt{mul}\): \[ \forall m \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{mul}(Z, m) = Z \]
text.italiano: Clausola base della definizione di \(\texttt{mul}\): \[ \forall m \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{mul}(Z, m) = Z \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem mul_base_clause : forall m : nterm , mul Z m = Z.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
